com.ihealth.communication.control

Class HS6Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.HS6Control

  • public class HS6Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Public API for HS6.

    Before using these methods,you need to call iHealthDevicesManager.sdkUserInAuthor(Context, String, String, String, int) for permission.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACTION_HS6_BIND
      Callback indicating bind user to the scale
      static java.lang.String ACTION_HS6_ERROR
      Callback indicating the error
      static java.lang.String ACTION_HS6_SETWIFI
      Callback indicating the setting wifi of HS6
      static java.lang.String ACTION_HS6_UNBIND
      Callback indicating unbind of HS6
      static java.lang.String BIND_HS6_RESULT
      The result of bind HS6 device.
      static java.lang.String HS6_BIND_EXTRA
      The return data of bind user
      static java.lang.String HS6_ERROR
      The error code: 1 user information upload error; 2 bind error
      static java.lang.String HS6_FIRMWARE_VERSION
      The firmware version of HS6
      static java.lang.String HS6_MODEL
      The model of HS6
      static java.lang.String HS6_POSITION
      The user position in the HS6 range frome 1 to 10，-1 if bind false
      static java.lang.String HS6_SETTED_WIFI
      Whether has setted wifi.1 setted ;0 not
      static java.lang.String HS6_SPECIFIED_BIND_RESULT
      The result of specified bind,it's boolean,true set success,otherwise false
      static java.lang.String HS6_UNBIND_RESULT
      the result of unBind,it's boolean,true set success,otherwise false
      static java.lang.String SETWIFI_RESULT
      The result of set wifi,it's a boolean,true set wifi success,otherwise false

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean bindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String birthday, int height, int isSporter, int gender, java.lang.String decode)
      Bind the user and scale together,after bind success user's weight datas can be transmitted to the cloud if the scale is connectting wifi.And this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
      boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid, java.lang.String password)
      Set wifi to the scale.
      boolean unBindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String decode)
      unBind the user and scale,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HS6Control

        public HS6Control(java.lang.String username,
                  Context context,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  iHealthDeviceHs6Callback hs6Callback)
        A construct of HS6Control
        Parameters:
        username - user ID
        context - Context
        userName - the unique ID for user
        type - the type of iHealth devices
        hs6Callback - all the information or data of these methods are returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback

    • Method Detail

      • setWifi

        public boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Set wifi to the scale.
        Parameters:
        ssid - the name of net
        password - the password of the net
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of set wifi is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.setWifiNotify(String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_SETWIFI

      • bindDeviceHS6

        public boolean bindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String birthday,
                             int height,
                             int isSporter,
                             int gender,
                             java.lang.String decode)
        Bind the user and scale together,after bind success user's weight datas can be transmitted to the cloud if the scale is connectting wifi.And this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        birthday - format like yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
        height - the unit is cm
        isSporter - 1 is sporter; 2 is not ;3 unknown
        gender - 0 is male ;1 is female
        decode - QR code information
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of binding user is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_BIND

      • unBindDeviceHS6

        public boolean unBindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String decode)
        unBind the user and scale,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        decode - the QR of HS6
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of unbinding user is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_UNBIND
